defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
repeatedly do
   set(:light , get_sensor_value(:A1)
  )

end

start do
   set(:temp , gp_get_temp(:D2)
  )
  in_time(5) do
     serial_wrap("tem",get(:temp))
    say(get(:temp))

   end

end

end
